item.title: M0u53m4t's Ess miner [[Built off Surajd's]]
item.dc:creator: @SoupyBastrd SoupyBastrd
item.description:
@SoupyBastrd wrote:

Ill Try it it looks good!, And if theres any bugs ill fix and repost!

EDIT:
Here I Added Multi users
[scar]{=========================================================================]
[ East-Varrock Essence Miner by Surajd & m0u53m4t ]
[ ]
[ WRITER : Surajd & m0u53m4t ]
[ CATEGORY : Mining ]
[ DESCRIPTION : Mines Essence and Bank them in Varrock East Bank]
[ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ]
[ NOTES : Thank Solemn Wishes for his Detection of Rooms ]
[ NOTES : And RealRune for RFindObj ]
[ CONTACT : SurajdSCR@Hotmail.com & junk4owen@hotmail.com ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in the PlayerForm ]
[ 4. WIELD YOUR PICKAXE! ]
[ 5. Start the Script in the most eastern red rope for best results! ]
[ 7. MAKE SURE THAT THE MINIMAP IS IN-LINE OR NEARLY!!! (Perfect North) ]
[ 6. THIS SCRIPT NOW SUPPORTS MULTI USERS THANX TO SOUPYBASTRD!! W00T ]
[=========================================================================}

Program SDEssMiner;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Skill\Mining.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Extended\xMapWalk.Scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Misc\Playerform.scar}

Var Arrow : Integer;
Var BColor : Integer;
Var MiTimes, BTimes, GTimes, ETimes : Integer;

Const RunDi = ‘N’; // Running Direction if your under attack
Const Loads = 10; // Number of loads before logging out

//************************************************************************//
Const StartPlayer = 0; // Do NOT Change!
//************************************************************************//
Const VersionNumber = ‘1.00’; // Dont change this!
//************************************************************************//

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
Setupplayers;
end;

procedure PlayerStats;
var Active: string;
var i: Integer;

begin
writeln(‘’);
writeln('Name : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Name);
writeln('Number : '+ inttostr(CurrentPlayer));
writeln('Mining Level : '+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Level[15]));
writeln('Select Skill : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Skill);
if Players[CurrentPlayer].Active=True then Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
writeln('Active : '+ Active);
writeln('Location : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].loc);
writeln('’);

for i := 0 to HowManyPlayers-1 do
begin
if Players[i].Active=True then Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
end
writeln(’**********************************************’);
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’<============== -’ + VersionNumber + ‘- Report ===============>’);
WriteLn(’ Worked for ’ + TimeRunning);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’ Mined: ’ + inttostr(MiTimes) + ’ Essence Rock(s)! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Banked: ’ + inttostr(BTimes) + ’ Load(s)! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Gained: ’ + inttostr(GTimes) + ’ Mining Experience! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Encountered: ’ + inttostr(ETimes) + ’ Fight(s)! ');
PlayerStats;
SRLRandomsReport;
end;

Procedure SetupScript;
begin
WriteLn(’ Thanks for using the Essence Miner made by Surajd and m0u53m4t ');
loginplayer;
MakeCompass(‘N’)
PerfectNorth
SetChat(‘off’, 1);
SetChat(‘off’, 2);
SetChat(‘off’, 3);
SetRun(true);
GameTab(4);
end;

{*******************************************************************************
Function ClickMMColorMulti(Color1 : Integer; Color2 : Integer; Color3 : Integer; MaxTol : Integer): Boolean;
By: Surajd
Description: Finds the specified Color on the MiniMap, if cannot find then Rises the Tolerance to look more effectively.
State: True = Left-Click
*******************************************************************************}
Function ClickMMColorMulti(Color1 : Integer; Color2 : Integer; Color3 : Integer; MaxTol : Integer): Boolean;
Var Tol : Integer;

Begin
for Tol:= 0 to MaxTol do
Begin
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, Color1, 574, 8, 724, 157, Tol)) or
FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, Color2, 574, 8, 724, 157, Tol) or
FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, Color3, 574, 8, 724, 157, Tol) then
MMouse(x, y, 0, 0);
GetMousePos(x, y);
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, True);
Flag;
Result := True;
Exit;
end;
end;

// ------- Taken from Realrune’s: SRL Willow Killer + Banker ------ \
function RFindObj(var cx, cy: Integer; Text, Text2, Text3: String; color, color2, color3, tolerance: Integer): Boolean;
var
x, y, a, c, i, x1, y1, x2, y2 : Integer;
begin
if (FindMSColorTol(x, y, color, tolerance)) or (FindMSColorTol(x, y, color3, tolerance)) or (FindMSColorTol(x, y, color3, tolerance)) then
begin
x1 := 245;
y1 := 165;
x2 := 277;
y2 := 185;
repeat
if (not (Loggedin)) then
break;
a := a + 1;
if (a = 1) then
c := c + 1;
if (a = 3) then
c := c + 1;
for i := 1 to c do
begin
if (a = 1) then
begin
x1 := x1 + 30;
x2 := x2 + 30;
end;
if (a = 2) then
begin
y1 := y1 - 20;
y2 := y2 - 20;
end;
if (a = 3) then
begin
x1 := x1 - 30;
x2 := x2 - 30;
end;
if (a = 4) then
begin
y1 := y1 + 20;
y2 := y2 + 20;
end;
if (x1 = 485) and (x2 = 517) then
x2 := x2 - 2;
if (y1 = 325) and (y2 = 345) then
y2 := y2 - 7;
if (x2 > 515) then
Break;
if (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color, x1, y1, x2, y2, tolerance)) or (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color2, x1, y1, x2, y2, tolerance)) or (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color3, x1, y1, x2, y2, tolerance)) then
begin
MMouse(x, y, 0, 0)
cx:=x;cy:=y;
if (IsUpTextMulti(Text, Text2, Text3)) then
begin
Result := True;
Break;
end;
end;
end;
if (a = 4) then
a := 0;
until (x2 > 515) or (Result = True);
end;
end;
// ------- End of Realrune’s nice RFindObj =D ------ \

Procedure AntiRandomsAR;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if (FindFight) then
begin
ETimes := ETimes + 1
WriteLn(‘We have encountered an attack, dodging…’)
RunTo(RunDi,true)
end;
end;

Procedure LoadImages;
begin
Arrow := BitmapFromString(4, 2, ‘C5BAC9C5BAC9C5BAC9C5BAC9E2’ +
‘6225E26225E26225E26225’);
end;

Procedure FindMiscColors;
begin
FindPickHeadColor;
GameTab(4);
BColor := GetSymbolColor(x, y, ‘bank’);
WriteLn(’ Bank Symbol Color: ’ +inttostr(BColor));
end;

function WorkingBankOpen(TimesToSearch: integer; Bank: string; AllowedToSpin: Boolean) : boolean; //By m0u53m4t
var boothdtm,attempts: integer;
begin
case bank of
‘veb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA635CC1C8C01006C44860C9E462063E200’ +
‘D12FD0F048C2B31D54C688C81AB0101006FB20935’);
‘vwb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA633CC4C8C0C0C7C4800C6A0B2218F8813’ +
‘45086E13F103082D4F0A3AA49F05182AB010100420C07D9’);
‘fb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA6364656460A866400185D1F60C5C401A2’ +
‘8C3F01F0818416AAA50D52849F1C2D58000584D25AA1A0D05414C’ +
‘35E5A86ABC1D4C30D594A2AA89F5B54151030078D50A03’);
‘eb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA63AC61646070056224B06C6A098304900’ +
‘689FE0702C63A20CB0D554D67AE010317540D08000055E60881’);
‘db’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA633CC4C8C0C0C7C4800C6A0B2218F8813’ +
‘45086E13F103082D4F0A3AA49F05182AB010100420C07D9’);
‘alb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA633CC4C8C0C0C7C4800C6A0B2218F8813’ +
‘45086E13F103082D4F0A3AA49F05182AB010100420C07D9’);
end;
if allowedtospin = true then begin
case bank of
‘veb’ : makecompass(‘N’)
‘vwb’ : makecompass(‘W’)
‘fb’ : makecompass(‘S’)
‘eb’ : makecompass(‘E’)
‘db’ : makecompass(‘W’)
‘alb’ : makecompass(‘W’)
end;
end
attempts := 0
repeat
repeat
attempts:= attempts +1
if finddtm(boothdtm,x,y,MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2) then mmouse(x,y,3,3)
wait(400+random(50))
until(option2(‘ank’) or (attempts >= TimesToSearch))
mouse(x,y,3,3,false)
wait(50+random(10))
ClickOption(‘quickly’,1)
flag
wait(800+random(500))
until ((bankscreen) or (attempts >= TimesToSearch))
result := true
freedtm(boothdtm)
if random(3) = 1 then if BankScreen then fixbank
if attempts >= TimesToSearch then result := false
end;

Procedure WalkToAubury;
Var C1, C2, C3 : Integer;
begin
if invfull then
begin
if WorkingBankOpen(8,‘veb’,true) then begin
if (BankScreen) then
Deposit(1, 28, 2);
WriteLn(’ Successfully Deposited all Essence! ');
BTimes := BTimes + 1
CloseBank
Wait(2000 + Random(76));
end
end
C1 := GetColor(649, 127);
C2 := GetColor(653, 120);
C3 := GetColor(647, 124);
ClickMMColorMulti(C1, C2, C3, 5);
Flag;
Wait( 5000 + Random(221));
Flag;
SymbolAccuracy := 0.1;
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘magic shop’)) then
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
Flag;
end;

Procedure FindAubury;
Var C:integer;
begin
C := 0
Repeat
Repeat
if C = 5 then
begin
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘magic shop’)) then
begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
Flag;
End
End
C := C + 1
Wait(2000 + Random(301));
Writeln(’ Looking for the Aubury… ');
if (RFindObj(x, y, ‘Aub’, ‘ubA’, ‘ury’, 1882616, 11316664, 2998011, 4)) then Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, false);
until ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Teleport’) or FindMMColorTol(x,y,2198397,25) = false
Flag;
Wait(4000)
flag
until FindMMColorTol(x,y,2198397,20) = false
Writeln(‘We have been teleported.’)
end;

// **************** Taken from Solemn Wishes Ess Miner *************************
Procedure DetectRoom2;
begin
Wait( 7000 + Random(689));
if (FindSymbol(x,y,‘transportation’) = false) then
begin
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x , y, 10855856, 561, 4, 719, 167, 14)) then
begin
WriteLn(‘We have been Teleported to the Middle-Room’);
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true)
wait(1000 + Random(33));
Flag;
end;
end;
end;

Function DetectRooms : Boolean;
begin
AntiRandomsAR;
Result := False;
if (FindBitmapToleranceIn(Arrow, x, y, 543, 3, 760, 165, 50)) then
Result := True;
if (Result = False)then
DetectRoom2;
end;
// *****************************************************************************

Procedure GoThruPortal;

begin
Repeat
if FindMMColorTol(x,y,1077594,20) = false then
begin
writeln(‘Teleporting.’)
if (RFindObj(x, y, ‘Use’, ‘Por’, ‘tal’, 12052714, 9874610, 10137526, 10)) then Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
Flag;
Wait(3000)
end;
Until FindMMColorTol(x,y,1077594,40)
Writeln(’ We have been teleported back’)
end;

Procedure MineTheEss;
begin
Wait( 5000 + Random(102));
Flag;
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘transportation’)) then WalkHalfWay(x,y)
repeat
if (RFindObj(x, y, ‘Run’, ‘Ess’, ‘Min’, 9211287, 5000274, 7171702, 5)) then
Writeln(’ Found the Essence Rock! Mining… ');
begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
MiTimes := MiTimes + 1
repeat
wait( 5000 + Random(999));
if Random(5) = 1 then if option2(‘Run’) or option2(‘Ess’) or option2(‘Min’) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
end
if option2(‘Run’) = false then
begin
if option2(‘Ess’) = false then
begin
if option2(‘Min’) = false then
begin
if (RFindObj(x, y, ‘Run’, ‘Ess’, ‘Min’, 9211287, 5000274, 7171702, 5)) then Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
end
end
end
until (ExistsItem(28));
writeln(‘Finnished Mining.’)
begin
GTimes := GTimes + 140
repeat
wait(1000)
until (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘transportation’))
Mouse(x, y, 3, 3, true);
Flag;
GoThruPortal;
end;
end;
until (ExistsItem(28))
end;

Procedure ToTheBank;
Var Banked,InBank: boolean;
Var Bankcol: Integer;
begin
BankCol := 5826047
Banked := false
repeat
WriteLn(’ Walking to the Bank… ‘);
Wait(2000 + Random(988));
Flag;
Mouse(671, 51, 0, 0, true);
Flag;
SymbolAccuracy := 0.1
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘bank’)) then
begin
InBank := true
Mouse(x, y, 0, -3, true);
Flag;
end
if inbank = false then
mouse(635,35,3,3,true)
if WorkingBankOpen(3,‘veb’,true) then begin
if (BankScreen) then
Deposit(1, 28, 2);
WriteLn(’ Successfully Deposited all Essence! ');
BTimes := BTimes + 1
CloseBank
Wait(2000 + Random(76));
Banked := true
end
if banked = false then
begin
ToBankers(bankcol,0,0)
Flag;
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘bank’)) then
Mouse(x, y, 0, -3, true);
Flag;
end
until banked = true
end;

Procedure MainLoop;
begin
DeclarePlayers;
repeat
Repeat
SetupScript;
FindMiscColors;
WalkToAubury;
FindAubury;
DetectRoom2;
MineTheEss;
ToTheBank;
until (BTimes = Loads);
ProgressReport;
Logout;
nextplayer(true)
Until(False);
end;

Begin
MiTimes := 0
BTimes := 0
GTimes := 0
ETimes := 0
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
MainLoop;
End.[/scar]

I tried it , and it got stufck finding the bank, it tried to find the bank before it got there, and then it tried walking to the bank over and over again and got lost up bye the wilderness… im going to try and fix that

item.title: M0u53m4t's Ess miner [[Built off Surajd's]]
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

Here it is… Its built off Surajd’s, but really works. Its still in beta, so often gets lost, but Im working on it.

[code]{=========================================================================]
[ East-Varrock Essence Miner by Surajd & m0u53m4t ]
[ ]
[ WRITER : Surajd & m0u53m4t ]
[ CATEGORY : Mining ]
[ DESCRIPTION : Mines Essence and Bank them in Varrock East Bank]
[ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ]
[ NOTES : Thank Solemn Wishes for his Detection of Rooms ]
[ NOTES : And RealRune for RFindObj ]
[ CONTACT : SurajdSCR@Hotmail.com & junk4owen@hotmail.com ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in the PlayerForm ]
[ 4. WIELD YOUR PICKAXE! ]
[ 5. Start the Script in the most eastern red rope for best results! ]
[ 7. MAKE SURE THAT THE MINIMAP IS IN-LINE OR NEARLY!!! (Perfect North) ]
[ 6. THIS SCRIPT DOES NOT SUPPORT MULTI-USERS FOR NOW! ]
[=========================================================================}

Program SDEssMiner;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Skill\Mining.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Extended\xMapWalk.Scar}

Var Arrow : Integer;
Var BColor : Integer;
Var MiTimes, BTimes, GTimes, ETimes : Integer;

Const RunDi = ‘N’; // Running Direction if your under attack
Const Loads = 100; // Number of loads before logging out

//************************************************************************//
Const StartPlayer = 0; // Do NOT Change!
//************************************************************************//
Const VersionNumber = ‘1.00’; // Dont change this!
//************************************************************************//

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1; // }
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // > Dont change these 3 options!
CurrentPlayer := StartPlayer; // }

 Players[0].Name   := 'h1tchh1k3r5';  // Enter your username here
 Players[0].Pass   := 'g00gle';  // Enter your password here
 Players[0].Nick   := '1tc';  // Enter any three letters of your username
 Players[0].Loc    := 'Varrock'; // Dont change this!
 Players[0].Skill  := '';      // Dont change this!
 Players[0].Active := True;  // Dont change this!

 writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers)+' Players');

end;

procedure PlayerStats;
var Active: string;
var i: Integer;

begin
writeln(‘’);
writeln('Name : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Name);
writeln('Number : '+ inttostr(CurrentPlayer));
writeln('Mining Level : '+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Level[15]));
writeln('Select Skill : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Skill);
if Players[CurrentPlayer].Active=True then Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
writeln('Active : '+ Active);
writeln('Location : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].loc);
writeln('’);

for i := 0 to HowManyPlayers-1 do
begin
if Players[i].Active=True then Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
end
writeln(’**********************************************’);
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’<============== -’ + VersionNumber + ‘- Report ===============>’);
WriteLn(’ Worked for ’ + TimeRunning);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’ Mined: ’ + inttostr(MiTimes) + ’ Essence Rock(s)! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Banked: ’ + inttostr(BTimes) + ’ Load(s)! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Gained: ’ + inttostr(GTimes) + ’ Mining Experience! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Encountered: ’ + inttostr(ETimes) + ’ Fight(s)! ');
PlayerStats;
SRLRandomsReport;
end;

Procedure SetupScript;
begin
WriteLn(’ Thanks for using the Essence Miner made by Surajd and m0u53m4t ');
MakeCompass(‘N’)
PerfectNorth
SetChat(‘off’, 1);
SetChat(‘off’, 2);
SetChat(‘off’, 3);
SetRun(true);
GameTab(4);
end;

{*******************************************************************************
Function ClickMMColorMulti(Color1 : Integer; Color2 : Integer; Color3 : Integer; MaxTol : Integer): Boolean;
By: Surajd
Description: Finds the specified Color on the MiniMap, if cannot find then Rises the Tolerance to look more effectively.
State: True = Left-Click
*******************************************************************************}
Function ClickMMColorMulti(Color1 : Integer; Color2 : Integer; Color3 : Integer; MaxTol : Integer): Boolean;
Var Tol : Integer;

Begin
for Tol:= 0 to MaxTol do
Begin
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, Color1, 574, 8, 724, 157, Tol)) or
FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, Color2, 574, 8, 724, 157, Tol) or
FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, Color3, 574, 8, 724, 157, Tol) then
MMouse(x, y, 0, 0);
GetMousePos(x, y);
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, True);
Flag;
Result := True;
Exit;
end;
end;

// ------- Taken from Realrune’s: SRL Willow Killer + Banker ------ \
function RFindObj(var cx, cy: Integer; Text, Text2, Text3: String; color, color2, color3, tolerance: Integer): Boolean;
var
x, y, a, c, i, x1, y1, x2, y2 : Integer;
begin
if (FindMSColorTol(x, y, color, tolerance)) or (FindMSColorTol(x, y, color3, tolerance)) or (FindMSColorTol(x, y, color3, tolerance)) then
begin
x1 := 245;
y1 := 165;
x2 := 277;
y2 := 185;
repeat
if (not (Loggedin)) then
break;
a := a + 1;
if (a = 1) then
c := c + 1;
if (a = 3) then
c := c + 1;
for i := 1 to c do
begin
if (a = 1) then
begin
x1 := x1 + 30;
x2 := x2 + 30;
end;
if (a = 2) then
begin
y1 := y1 - 20;
y2 := y2 - 20;
end;
if (a = 3) then
begin
x1 := x1 - 30;
x2 := x2 - 30;
end;
if (a = 4) then
begin
y1 := y1 + 20;
y2 := y2 + 20;
end;
if (x1 = 485) and (x2 = 517) then
x2 := x2 - 2;
if (y1 = 325) and (y2 = 345) then
y2 := y2 - 7;
if (x2 > 515) then
Break;
if (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color, x1, y1, x2, y2, tolerance)) or (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color2, x1, y1, x2, y2, tolerance)) or (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color3, x1, y1, x2, y2, tolerance)) then
begin
MMouse(x, y, 0, 0)
cx:=x;cy:=y;
if (IsUpTextMulti(Text, Text2, Text3)) then
begin
Result := True;
Break;
end;
end;
end;
if (a = 4) then
a := 0;
until (x2 > 515) or (Result = True);
end;
end;
// ------- End of Realrune’s nice RFindObj =D ------ \

Procedure AntiRandomsAR;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if (FindFight) then
begin
ETimes := ETimes + 1
WriteLn(‘We have encountered an attack, dodging…’)
RunTo(RunDi,true)
end;
end;

Procedure LoadImages;
begin
Arrow := BitmapFromString(4, 2, ‘C5BAC9C5BAC9C5BAC9C5BAC9E2’ +
‘6225E26225E26225E26225’);
end;

Procedure FindMiscColors;
begin
FindPickHeadColor;
GameTab(4);
BColor := GetSymbolColor(x, y, ‘bank’);
WriteLn(’ Bank Symbol Color: ’ +inttostr(BColor));
end;

function WorkingBankOpen(TimesToSearch: integer; Bank: string; AllowedToSpin: Boolean) : boolean; //By m0u53m4t
var boothdtm,attempts: integer;
begin
case bank of
‘veb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA635CC1C8C01006C44860C9E462063E200’ +
‘D12FD0F048C2B31D54C688C81AB0101006FB20935’);
‘vwb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA633CC4C8C0C0C7C4800C6A0B2218F8813’ +
‘45086E13F103082D4F0A3AA49F05182AB010100420C07D9’);
‘fb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA6364656460A866400185D1F60C5C401A2’ +
‘8C3F01F0818416AAA50D52849F1C2D58000584D25AA1A0D05414C’ +
‘35E5A86ABC1D4C30D594A2AA89F5B54151030078D50A03’);
‘eb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA63AC61646070056224B06C6A098304900’ +
‘689FE0702C63A20CB0D554D67AE010317540D08000055E60881’);
‘db’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA633CC4C8C0C0C7C4800C6A0B2218F8813’ +
‘45086E13F103082D4F0A3AA49F05182AB010100420C07D9’);
‘alb’ : boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA633CC4C8C0C0C7C4800C6A0B2218F8813’ +
‘45086E13F103082D4F0A3AA49F05182AB010100420C07D9’);
end;
if allowedtospin = true then begin
case bank of
‘veb’ : makecompass(‘N’)
‘vwb’ : makecompass(‘W’)
‘fb’ : makecompass(‘S’)
‘eb’ : makecompass(‘E’)
‘db’ : makecompass(‘W’)
‘alb’ : makecompass(‘W’)
end;
end
attempts := 0
repeat
repeat
attempts:= attempts +1
if finddtm(boothdtm,x,y,MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2) then mmouse(x,y,3,3)
wait(400+random(50))
until(option2(‘ank’) or (attempts >= TimesToSearch))
mouse(x,y,3,3,false)
wait(50+random(10))
ClickOption(‘quickly’,1)
flag
wait(800+random(500))
until ((bankscreen) or (attempts >= TimesToSearch))
result := true
freedtm(boothdtm)
if random(3) = 1 then if BankScreen then fixbank
if attempts >= TimesToSearch then result := false
end;

Procedure WalkToAubury;
Var C1, C2, C3 : Integer;
begin
if invfull then
begin
if WorkingBankOpen(8,‘veb’,true) then begin
if (BankScreen) then
Deposit(1, 28, 2);
WriteLn(’ Successfully Deposited all Essence! ');
BTimes := BTimes + 1
CloseBank
Wait(2000 + Random(76));
end
end
C1 := GetColor(649, 127);
C2 := GetColor(653, 120);
C3 := GetColor(647, 124);
ClickMMColorMulti(C1, C2, C3, 5);
Flag;
Wait( 5000 + Random(221));
Flag;
SymbolAccuracy := 0.1;
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘magic shop’)) then
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
Flag;
end;

Procedure FindAubury;
Var C:integer;
begin
C := 0
Repeat
Repeat
if C = 5 then
begin
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘magic shop’)) then
begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
Flag;
End
End
C := C + 1
Wait(2000 + Random(301));
Writeln(’ Looking for the Aubury… ');
if (RFindObj(x, y, ‘Aub’, ‘ubA’, ‘ury’, 1882616, 11316664, 2998011, 4)) then Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, false);
until ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Teleport’) or FindMMColorTol(x,y,2198397,25) = false
Flag;
Wait(4000)
flag
until FindMMColorTol(x,y,2198397,20) = false
Writeln(‘We have been teleported.’)
end;

// **************** Taken from Solemn Wishes Ess Miner *************************
Procedure DetectRoom2;
begin
Wait( 7000 + Random(689));
if (FindSymbol(x,y,‘transportation’) = false) then
begin
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x , y, 10855856, 561, 4, 719, 167, 14)) then
begin
WriteLn(‘We have been Teleported to the Middle-Room’);
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true)
wait(1000 + Random(33));
Flag;
end;
end;
end;

Function DetectRooms : Boolean;
begin
AntiRandomsAR;
Result := False;
if (FindBitmapToleranceIn(Arrow, x, y, 543, 3, 760, 165, 50)) then
Result := True;
if (Result = False)then
DetectRoom2;
end;
// *****************************************************************************

Procedure GoThruPortal;

begin
Repeat
if FindMMColorTol(x,y,1077594,20) = false then
begin
writeln(‘Teleporting.’)
if (RFindObj(x, y, ‘Use’, ‘Por’, ‘tal’, 12052714, 9874610, 10137526, 10)) then Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
Flag;
Wait(3000)
end;
Until FindMMColorTol(x,y,1077594,40)
Writeln(’ We have been teleported back’)
end;

Procedure MineTheEss;
begin
Wait( 5000 + Random(102));
Flag;
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘transportation’)) then WalkHalfWay(x,y)
repeat
if (RFindObj(x, y, ‘Run’, ‘Ess’, ‘Min’, 9211287, 5000274, 7171702, 5)) then
Writeln(’ Found the Essence Rock! Mining… ');
begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
MiTimes := MiTimes + 1
repeat
wait( 5000 + Random(999));
if Random(5) = 1 then if option2(‘Run’) or option2(‘Ess’) or option2(‘Min’) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
end
if option2(‘Run’) = false then
begin
if option2(‘Ess’) = false then
begin
if option2(‘Min’) = false then
begin
if (RFindObj(x, y, ‘Run’, ‘Ess’, ‘Min’, 9211287, 5000274, 7171702, 5)) then Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
end
end
end
until (ExistsItem(28));
writeln(‘Finnished Mining.’)
begin
GTimes := GTimes + 140
repeat
wait(1000)
until (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘transportation’))
Mouse(x, y, 3, 3, true);
Flag;
GoThruPortal;
end;
end;
until (ExistsItem(28))
end;

Procedure ToTheBank;
Var Banked,InBank: boolean;
Var Bankcol: Integer;
begin
BankCol := 5826047
Banked := false
repeat
WriteLn(’ Walking to the Bank… ‘);
Wait(2000 + Random(988));
Flag;
Mouse(671, 51, 0, 0, true);
Flag;
SymbolAccuracy := 0.1
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘bank’)) then
begin
InBank := true
Mouse(x, y, 0, -3, true);
Flag;
end
if inbank = false then
mouse(635,35,3,3,true)
if WorkingBankOpen(3,‘veb’,true) then begin
if (BankScreen) then
Deposit(1, 28, 2);
WriteLn(’ Successfully Deposited all Essence! ');
BTimes := BTimes + 1
CloseBank
Wait(2000 + Random(76));
Banked := true
end
if banked = false then
begin
ToBankers(bankcol,0,0)
Flag;
if (FindSymbol(x, y, ‘bank’)) then
Mouse(x, y, 0, -3, true);
Flag;
end
until banked = true
end;

Procedure MainLoop;
begin
DeclarePlayers;
repeat
SetupScript;
FindMiscColors;
WalkToAubury;
FindAubury;
DetectRoom2;
MineTheEss;
ToTheBank;
until (BTimes = Loads);
ProgressReport;
Logout;
WriteLn(’ Thanks for using the Essence Miner made by Surajd and m0u53m4t ');
end;

Begin
MiTimes := 0
BTimes := 0
GTimes := 0
ETimes := 0
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
MainLoop;
End.[/code]
